comments:

Hi Jon,

Could you please try to describe with a little more detail how to reproduce the
error? E.g. what you did in the Call Hierarchy view (while it worked), what you
did afterwards, what kind of method you searched for callers/callees on etc.

In addition, I'd like to know what version of Eclipse you are running on.

M7 build.  I'll try to put together more detail if I can't get a simple test 
case together to show this.

Closing the bug report until we have a reproducible case. Please reopen if you
have one.
